SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface AdminDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminDAOImpl
public interface AdminDAOInterface
Interface representing the data access object (DAO) for admin-related operations. Provides methods to manage admin users, courses, professors, and other administrative tasks.

  • Method Details

    • createAdmins

      void createAdmins(int userID, String name, String role, String username, String password, String doj)
      Creates a new admin user with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userID - Unique identifier for the admin.
      name - Name of the admin.
      role - Role of the admin in the organization.
      username - Username for the admin.
      password - Password for the admin.
      doj - Date of joining of the admin.

    • findAdminByUsername

      Integer findAdminByUsername(String username)
      Finds the admin ID by username.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the admin.
      Returns:
      Admin ID associated with the username.

    • findAdminById

      Admin findAdminById(Integer adminID)
      Finds an admin by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      adminID - Unique identifier of the admin.
      Returns:
      Admin object corresponding to the admin ID.

    • approveStudentRegistration

      void approveStudentRegistration(int studentId)
      Approves the registration of a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - Unique identifier of the student to approve.

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(String courseName, int courseID, int totalSeats, int availableSeats, boolean isAvailableThisSemester)
      Adds a new course with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      courseName - Name of the course.
      courseID - Unique identifier for the course.
      totalSeats - Total number of seats available for the course.
      availableSeats - Number of seats currently available.
      isAvailableThisSemester - Indicates if the course is available in the current semester.

    • removeCourse

      boolean removeCourse(int courseID)
      Removes a course by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      courseID - Unique identifier of the course to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the course was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • addProfessor

      void addProfessor(int instructorID, String name, String username, String password, String department, String designation)
      Adds a new professor with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      instructorID - Unique identifier for the professor.
      name - Name of the professor.
      username - Username for the professor.
      password - Password for the professor.
      department - Department of the professor.
      designation - Designation of the professor.

    • removeProfessor

      boolean removeProfessor(int professorID)
      Removes a professor by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      professorID - Unique identifier of the professor to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the professor was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • calculateCpi

      Float calculateCpi(int studentId)
      Calculates the Cumulative Performance Index (CPI) of a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - Unique identifier of the student.
      Returns:
      CPI of the student.

    • generateReportCard

      ReportCard generateReportCard(int studentID)
      Generates a report card for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - Unique identifier of the student.
      Returns:
      ReportCard object containing the student's academic performance.

    • sendFeePayNotification

      void sendFeePayNotification()
      Sends a notification to students to pay their fees.

    • PaymentCompletionNotification

      void PaymentCompletionNotification(int studentID)
      Sends a notification upon completion of payment by a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - Unique identifier of the student who completed the payment.

    • viewCourseStudentList

      HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Student>> viewCourseStudentList(int courseID)
      Retrieves the list of students enrolled in a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseID - Unique identifier of the course.
      Returns:
      HashMap where the key is the course ID and the value is the list of students enrolled.

    • getPendingStudentAccountsList

      List<Student> getPendingStudentAccountsList()
      Retrieves the list of student accounts that are pending approval.
      Returns:
      List of students whose accounts are pending approval.
